Subsection.Text: The department shall conduct, supervise, and administer all school food and nutrition programs that will be carried out using federal or state funds, or funds from any other source.

The department shall cooperate fully with the United States Government and its agencies and instrumentalities so that the department may receive the benefit of all federal financial allotments and assistance possible to carry out the purposes of this chapter.

The department may act as agent of, or contract with, the Federal Government, another state agency, or any county or municipal government for the administration of the school food and nutrition programs, including the distribution of funds provided by the Federal Government to support the school food and nutrition programs.
